messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RE: History trivia question
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/29/02 3:58:48 PM, shellyrae00@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/29/02 3:58:48 PM, shellyrae00@... writes:

<< So I KNEW the answer, but now you're all going to
think I copied off Sandra. >>

I didn't know the answer, I looked it up.
So if you knew it, and we had all been sitting in a room together, your hand
would have shot up and you would be the winner!!!

I concede! <g>

(Do those urges ever go away?)

Sandra

messages.subject: RE: History trivia question
messages.msgSnippet: Rats! I wanted to be the first one to get the answer about the trivia question. U.S. Grant lived in Galena, Illinois, my birthplace. I still live nearby, and
messages.messageBody:
Rats!

I wanted to be the first one to get the answer about
the trivia question. U.S. Grant lived in Galena,
Illinois, my birthplace. I still live nearby, and
there happens to be U.S. Grant trivia strewn about
here and there for those of us who choose to be
distracted by it.

So I KNEW the answer, but now you're all going to
think I copied off Sandra.

I'll just go sulk now .... sigh

Shelly
